languages.text: {n}Старик упирает в вас мрачный взгляд.{/n} "Ты говорил{mf||а} мне, что моя вера ложна, заставил{mf||а} отвернуться от Зари. И кто был прав, а, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольный Торговец{/g}? Вот он — Последний восход!" {n}Он обводит рукой вокруг.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Старик упирает в вас мрачный взгляд.{/n} "Ты говорил{mf||а} мне, что моя вера ложна, заставил{mf||а} отвернуться от Зари. И кто был прав, а, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольный Торговец{/g}? Вот он — Последний восход!" {n}Он обводит рукой вокруг.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The old man peers at you gloomily.{/n} "You told me my faith was false. You made me turn away from Aurora. Now what do you say, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}? Who was right? Here it is — the Final Dawn!" {n}He makes a sweeping gesture with his hand.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Старик упирает в вас мрачный взгляд.{/n} "Ты говорил{mf||а} мне, что моя вера ложна, заставил{mf||а} отвернуться от Зари. И кто был прав, а, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольный Торговец{/g}? Вот он — Последний восход!" {n}Он обводит рукой вокруг.{/n}

{n}The old man peers at you gloomily.{/n} "You told me my faith was false. You made me turn away from Aurora. Now what do you say, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}? Who was right? Here it is — the Final Dawn!" {n}He makes a sweeping gesture with his hand.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der alte Mann blickt dich düster an.{/n} "Ihr habt mir gesagt, mein Vertrauen sei falsch gewesen. Ihr habt mich dazu gebracht, mich von Aurora abzuwenden. Was sagt Ihr jetzt, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}{/g}? Wer hatte recht? Sie ist da — die Letzte Dämmerung!" {n}Er führt eine allumfassende Geste mit seiner Hand aus.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The old man peers at you gloomily.{/n} "You told me my faith was false. You made me turn away from Aurora. Now what do you say, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}? Who was right? Here it is — the Final Dawn!" {n}He makes a sweeping gesture with his hand.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der alte Mann blickt dich düster an.{/n} "Ihr habt mir gesagt, mein Vertrauen sei falsch gewesen. Ihr habt mich dazu gebracht, mich von Aurora abzuwenden. Was sagt Ihr jetzt, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}{/g}? Wer hatte recht? Sie ist da — die Letzte Dämmerung!" {n}Er führt eine allumfassende Geste mit seiner Hand aus.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le vieillard vous regarde d'un air sombre.{/n} « Vous m'avez dit que ma foi était fausse. Vous m'avez poussé à me détourner d'Aurore. Et maintenant, qu'en dites-vous, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}{/g} ? Qui avait raison ? La voilà ! L'Aube finale ! » {n}s'exclame-t-il avec un large geste de la main.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The old man peers at you gloomily.{/n} "You told me my faith was false. You made me turn away from Aurora. Now what do you say, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}? Who was right? Here it is — the Final Dawn!" {n}He makes a sweeping gesture with his hand.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le vieillard vous regarde d'un air sombre.{/n} « Vous m'avez dit que ma foi était fausse. Vous m'avez poussé à me détourner d'Aurore. Et maintenant, qu'en dites-vous, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}{/g} ? Qui avait raison ? La voilà ! L'Aube finale ! » {n}s'exclame-t-il avec un large geste de la main.{/n}

languages.text: {n}老人忧郁地凝视着你。{/n}“你之前告诉我，说我的信仰是虚假的，你让我背叛了‘极光’。可现在你怎么说，{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}？谁才是假的呢？它来了，终末黎明来了！”{n}他挥了挥手。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The old man peers at you gloomily.{/n} "You told me my faith was false. You made me turn away from Aurora. Now what do you say, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}? Who was right? Here it is — the Final Dawn!" {n}He makes a sweeping gesture with his hand.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}老人忧郁地凝视着你。{/n}“你之前告诉我，说我的信仰是虚假的，你让我背叛了‘极光’。可现在你怎么说，{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}？谁才是假的呢？它来了，终末黎明来了！”{n}他挥了挥手。{/n}

languages.text: {n}老人は陰鬱な表情であなたを見つめる。{/n}「あなたは私に、私の信仰が偽りだと言いました。あなたは私をオーロラから背けさせました。さあ、どう弁明しますか、{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}ローグトレーダー{/g}？誰が正しかったのですか？これこそが、最後の夜明け！」{n}彼は手を大きく広げて振った。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The old man peers at you gloomily.{/n} "You told me my faith was false. You made me turn away from Aurora. Now what do you say, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}? Who was right? Here it is — the Final Dawn!" {n}He makes a sweeping gesture with his hand.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}老人は陰鬱な表情であなたを見つめる。{/n}「あなたは私に、私の信仰が偽りだと言いました。あなたは私をオーロラから背けさせました。さあ、どう弁明しますか、{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}ローグトレーダー{/g}？誰が正しかったのですか？これこそが、最後の夜明け！」{n}彼は手を大きく広げて振った。{/n}

languages.text: {n}El anciano te mira con tristeza.{/n} «Me dijo que mi fe era falsa. Me hizo alejarme de Aurora. ¿Qué dice, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g}? ¿Quién tenía razón? Aquí está, ¡el Amanecer Final!». {n}Hace un gesto de barrer con la mano.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The old man peers at you gloomily.{/n} "You told me my faith was false. You made me turn away from Aurora. Now what do you say, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}? Who was right? Here it is — the Final Dawn!" {n}He makes a sweeping gesture with his hand.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El anciano te mira con tristeza.{/n} «Me dijo que mi fe era falsa. Me hizo alejarme de Aurora. ¿Qué dice, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g}? ¿Quién tenía razón? Aquí está, ¡el Amanecer Final!». {n}Hace un gesto de barrer con la mano.{/n}

languages.text: {n}İhtiyar, gözlerinde kasvetli bir ifadeyle sana bakıyor.{/n} "İnancıma sahte dediniz. Aurora'ya sırt çevirttiniz. Şimdi ne diyeceksiniz pek yüce {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir{/g}? Kim haklıymış? Alın işte, geldi Nihai Şafak!" {n}Adam, ellerini hararetle sallıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The old man peers at you gloomily.{/n} "You told me my faith was false. You made me turn away from Aurora. Now what do you say, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}? Who was right? Here it is — the Final Dawn!" {n}He makes a sweeping gesture with his hand.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}İhtiyar, gözlerinde kasvetli bir ifadeyle sana bakıyor.{/n} "İnancımı inkâr ettiniz. Beni Aurora'dan beni. Şimdi ne buyur edeceksiniz {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir{/g}? Kim haklıymış? Buyurun, geldi işte Nihai Şafak!" {n}Ellerini hararetle sallıyor.{/n}
